name: ASwitchActor
doc:
Switch Actor allows quickly toggling the visibility of its child actors so that
only one is visible at a time. It can also be captured with the Variant Manager
to expose this capability as a property capture

SceneComponent: Exposing our root component like this allows manual Mobility control on the details panel

methods.name: GetOptions
methods.doc: Returns the child actors that are available options, in a fixed order that may differ from the one displayed in the world outliner

methods.name: GetSelectedOption
methods.doc: If we have exactly one child actor visible, it will return a pointer to it. Returns nullptr otherwise

methods.name: SelectOption
methods.doc: Select one of the available options by index
